hero.title: El Madrasa
hero.description1: Learn programming, languages, video editing, and content creation in a fun and practical way suitable for all levels.
hero.description2: Join our community and unlock your digital skills with interactive courses and modern, high-quality content.

coursesPreview.title: Learn Programming
coursesPreview.description: Master coding skills with interactive courses.

coursesPreview.title: Career Growth
coursesPreview.description: Boost your career with digital skills.

translations.fullStackWebDevDesc: Master front-end and back-end web development with real projects.
translations.pythonProgrammingDesc: Learn Python from scratch and build practical applications.
translations.reactEssentialsDesc: Build modern web apps using React, Redux, and Hooks.
translations.androidDevDesc: Create Android apps with Java and Kotlin, from design to deployment.
translations.machineLearningBasicsDesc: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning using Python.
translations.germanForBeginnersDesc: Learn basic German grammar, vocabulary, and conversation skills.
translations.englishConversationDesc: Improve your English speaking and listening skills for everyday use.
translations.videoEditingPremiereDesc: Learn professional video editing techniques with Adobe Premiere Pro.
translations.afterEffectsDesc: Create stunning motion graphics and animations using After Effects.
translations.finalCutProDesc: Edit professional videos for YouTube and social media using Final Cut Pro.
translations.contentCreationMasteryDesc: Learn to create engaging content for social media and blogs.
translations.dropshippingBusinessDesc: Start and run a profitable dropshipping business from scratch.

testimonials.name: Mahmoud Fathy
testimonials.comment: The Full-Stack Web Development course helped me land my first developer job!

testimonials.name: Menna kamel
testimonials.comment: Python Programming course was very practical and easy to follow. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Lina Hassan
testimonials.comment: I learned so much from React.js Essentials. Now I can build real apps confidently.

testimonials.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
testimonials.comment: Android App Development course gave me the skills to publish my first app!

testimonials.name: Mayar Mostafa
testimonials.comment: Machine Learning Basics opened a new career path for me in AI projects.

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.comment: German Language for Beginners helped me communicate easily during my trip to Germany.

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.comment: English Conversation Skills course boosted my confidence in international meetings.

testimonials.name: Ali Hassan
testimonials.comment: Video Editing with Premiere Pro was fun and professional. My videos now look amazing.

testimonials.name: Maya Rodriguez
testimonials.comment: After Effects Motion Graphics course helped me land my first freelance animation project.

testimonials.name: Khalid Saeed
testimonials.comment: Final Cut Pro Video Editing course is perfect for content creators wanting professional results.

testimonials.name: Noura Al-Mansouri
testimonials.comment: Content Creation Mastery taught me how to create engaging posts for social media effectively.

testimonials.name: James Lee
testimonials.comment: Dropshipping Business course helped me start my first online store successfully.

aspirations.title: Our Aspirations
aspirations.subtitle: Building the future of digital education with passion and innovation

cards.title: Empowering Learners
cards.description: We equip students with cutting-edge, real-world skills to dominate the modern tech landscape.

cards.title: Educational Excellence
cards.description: Experience world-class content curated by industry veterans and expert educators.

cards.title: Future-Ready Skills
cards.description: Our curriculum is engineered to bridge the gap between learning and professional success.

cards.title: Global Community
cards.description: Join a vibrant ecosystem of learners and mentors from around the globe.

doctors.title: Our professors
doctors.descrption: We have highly qualified university professors and specialists with 30 years of experience

cards.title: Mahmoud Mohamed Fathy
cards.description: Full Stack Developer Professor at MUST | Cairo University with 17 years of experience, worked in Microsoft for 3 years and Apple for 5 years.

cards.title: Menna Kamel Ibrahim
cards.description: Cybersecurity specialist and technical instructor with 17 years of experience in network security, penetration testing, and securing enterprise web applications.

cards.title: Sara Kamel Ibrahim
cards.description: Professional video editor and content creator with 7 years of experience, specialized in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and social media video production.

cards.title: Khaled Mostafa Ali
cards.description: Dropshipping mentor and e-commerce consultant with 8 years of experience, helped build and scale multiple Shopify stores targeting international markets.

cards.title: Mostafa Ali Hassan
cards.description: Back-End Developer and programming instructor with 10 years of experience, specialized in Node.js, Laravel, REST APIs, and database optimization.

footer.title: EL - MADRASA
footer.description: El Madrasa is an educational platform designed to empower individuals with essential digital skills through interactive courses and modern content. Our mission is to provide accessible, high-quality training that prepares learners for success in today's rapidly evolving technological landscape.
footer.creator: Created By Eng:-Mahmoud Fathy
